Sampling

· 1 min read

On this map you can find informations on the plots that we will study. First, in a searchable table, then in an interactive map. The map consists of different layers (e.g. management parcels) that you can activate clicking on the top right of the map. You can also use the map in full-screen (top left) and display your current position on the map (top left).
